sourcesContent:
<template>
    生气
</template>
<script>
import { reactive, toRefs } from "vue";
import axios from "axios";
import { mapGetters } from "vuex";
export default {
    name: "regional_information",
    components: {},
    setup() {
        //这里存放数据
        const data = reactive({
            region: {},
            heroes: [],
        });
        return {
            ...toRefs(data),
        };
    },
    //计算属性
    computed: {},
    //监听属性
    watch: {},
    //方法集合
    methods: {
        ...mapGetters(["GET_ROGIONBYFORMERLY"]),
        getHeroesByRegion(regionId) {
            axios
                .get(
                    `http://localhost:8089/api/findHeroesByRegion?region=${regionId}`
                )
                .then((response) => {
                    this.heroes = response.data;
                })
                .catch((error) => {
                    console.error(error);
                });
        },
    },
    //生命周期 - 创建完成（可以访问当前this实例）
    created() {},
    //生命周期 - 挂载完成（可以访问DOM元素）
    mounted() {
        this.region = this.GET_ROGIONBYFORMERLY(this.$route.params.regionId);
        this.getHeroesByRegion(this.$route.params.regionId);
    },
    beforeCreate() {}, //生命周期 - 创建之前
    beforeMount() {}, //生命周期 - 挂载之前
    beforeUpdate() {}, //生命周期 - 更新之前
    updated() {}, //生命周期 - 更新之后
    beforeDestroy() {}, //生命周期 - 销毁之前
    destroyed() {}, //生命周期 - 销毁完成
    activated() {}, //如果页面有keep-alive缓存功能，这个函数会触发
};
</script>
<style lang='less' scoped>
@import url(../assets/css/Clear_style.css);
@import url(../assets/css/regional_information.css);
</style>
